macroEditor.name: Use for editing macros
macroEditor.hint: Use a CodeMirror editor in the macro editing dialog. This setting is not compatible with other modules that modify the macro editor such as The Furnace.

smartIndent.name: Smart Indentation
smartIndent.hint: Whether to use the context-sensitive indentation that the mode provides (or just indent the same as the line before).

indentUnit.name: Indent Depth
indentUnit.hint: How many spaces a block (whatever that means in the edited language) should be indented.

tabSize.name: Tab Size
tabSize.hint: The width of a tab character.

indentWithTabs.name: Indent With Tabs
indentWithTabs.hint: Whether, when indenting, the first N*tabSize spaces should be replaced by N tabs.

lineWrapping.name: Line Wrapping
lineWrapping.hint: Whether CodeMirror should scroll or wrap for long lines.
